Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel on Venice Lagoon”
Reviews.Author: venicefan
Reviews.Content: stayed june 2000 cosmos italian holiday nice comfortable spacious quality food despite fixed menus easy venice remember getting terminal catching waterbus st marks 2000 vaporetto service goes zattere check date vaporetto timetables exception lines 1 2 serving grand canal service changed difficulty hands venice dont afraid vaporetto staff help

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Gallimberti
HotelInfo.Address: Via Malcanton, 33 | Malcontenta, 30033 Venice, Italy
